content: {"name": "Glenmont United Methodist Church (GLEN)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please call Manna\u2019s main office during regular business hours at (301) 424-1130.  We need to receive your call by 12:00 pm the day before you would like to receive food so we can have your order ready. Location is outside: Look for our truck in the parking lot\n\nWhen you come to pick up food, you need a photo ID with your current Montgomery County address, or provide a document that proves you currently reside in the county.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mannafood.org/about/contact-manna/manna-food-distribution-sites/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "12901 Georgia Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Silver Spring", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20906", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.0674935, "longitude": -77.0593777}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 424-1130", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Mobile pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Distribution in parking lot"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
